project_descr: Put the country on a more robust development path by helping the local authorities to restore security, essential services delivery and livelihoods opportunities.

outputs.output_descr: Strengthen the responsiveness of local institutions to address needs related with crisis-affected populations and in leading recovery processes.Ensure better provision of basic services at local level and increase access for most vulnerable groups
